import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

# Libraries
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as px
source.0d232dce:
X = coldat0('Q10')
fig = px.treemap(X, path=[X.index], labels=X.index, values=X, title='Regular basis hosted notebook products')
fig.show()
source.56e35ac9:
index = [i for i in df.columns if 'Q10' in i]
X = pd.DataFrame([])
for ind in index:
    Inter = df.groupby(by=[ind,'Q1']).count()['Q3'].reset_index()
    Inter.columns = ['Q10','Q1','Q3']
    X = X.append(Inter)

fig = px.funnel(X, x='Q10', y='Q3', color='Q1', title = 'Age of Data Analyst and hosted notebook products')
fig.show()
source.af5fa1c8:
X = coldat0('Q26_B')
fig = px.pie(X, values=X, names=X.index)
fig.update_traces(textposition='inside')
fig.update_layout(uniformtext_minsize=12, uniformtext_mode='hide', title= 'Expected cloud computing platforms in next 2 years')
fig.show()

source.96befd95:
M = dfmaster.groupby(['Q5', 'Q24']).size().unstack().fillna(0).astype(int)

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=[15, 9])
sns.heatmap(data=M,cmap='bone_r', linewidths=0.2, square=True,annot=True, fmt = 'd', 
            annot_kws={'alpha': 0.9}, cbar_kws={'shrink': 0.6, 'label': 'Number of survey-participants'})
plt.title('Working position of Master level and Salary', fontsize=16, fontweight='bold', loc='left', va='bottom');
source.f886fba3:

            annot_kws={'alpha': 0.9}, cbar_kws={'shrink': 0.6, 'label': 'Number of survey-participants'})

source.01e8efa5:
# This FINAL PART will discuss on the furture of DATA ANALYTIC JOBS. 

I will analyse the Kaggle survey data in 2020 using interactive graphics. This PART covers 2 topics with 11 survey questions.
source.6b9d6c17: While most of Master levels are "Students" and "Data Scientist", and they are very young, under 30.
source.ae337acb:
+ Data scientist must use many data analysis skills, combined with knowledge of business as well as statistical methods. It includes mixed model, predictive response model. In addition, they must use optimization techniques to meet the business needs of customers.
    
+ They have to develop and install statistical tools. it helps to build predictive models. These models assist customers in customer marketing and demand creation initiatives.
    
+ Data scientist collaborates with internal consulting groups to provide analytical goals and approaches. In addition, scheduling work to provide programming and analysis support for internal consulting. In addition, good storytelling, communication, and problem solving skills are essential for most jobs. Again, keep one thing in mind. Specific requirements will vary by company and location.

source.5d41a31f: Congratulations Kaggle ! on having the largest 'clients' of all media sources. This result matches the survey where the Data Analysts host their notebooks. But, data analysis or ML are shared the most on GitHub, not Kaggle.
